ingredients.item: 2 x 225g packs pome dei moro tomatoes

instructions.step: Put the salad onions, garlic, chipotle paste, lime juice and most of the coriander in a food processor and whizz until very finely chopped. Add the tomatoes and pulse once or twice until chopped into chunks.

Transfer to a bowl and season. Taste and adjust with more lime juice or chipotle paste if liked. Serve in a bowl with the remaining coriander leaves scattered over and the tortilla chips ready to dunk in.
